TextLibrary.Text: You have failed to defeat the Doomknight. The cubs remain in peril.
You have defeated the Doomknight. The cubs are safe; now return them to Winter.
Winter displays his gratitude for your help.
You must first go to the Dragon Shrine and defeat the Doomknight to rescue the wolf cubs.
You have rescued the wolf cubs. You must now return to Ylarie for your reward.
